statements: SELECT * FROM public_transportation_usage;
SELECT id, route_name, date, boarding_count, alighting_count FROM public_transportation_usage;
SELECT route_name, boarding_count FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT route_name, boarding_count FROM public_transportation_usage ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT id, date, boarding_count, alighting_count FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE boarding_count > 20;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE route_name = 'Route A' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE boarding_count > 100 AND alighting_count < 50 ORDER BY route_name ASC, date DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, boarding_count FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND (boarding_count - alighting_count) > 0;
SELECT route_name, SUM(boarding_count) AS total_boarding FROM public_transportation_usage GROUP BY route_name ORDER BY total_boarding DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE route_name LIKE '%Route%' AND boarding_count + alighting_count > 200 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_usage;
SELECT route_id, date, total_passengers FROM public_transportation_usage;
SELECT date, total_passengers, route_id FROM public_transportation_usage ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_efficiency WHERE on_time_performance > 0.8;
SELECT on_time_performance, route_id FROM service_efficiency ORDER BY on_time_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT route_id, SUM(total_passengers) AS total_passengers FROM public_transportation_usage GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_passengers > 100;
SELECT route_id, AVG(on_time_performance) AS average_on_time_performance FROM service_efficiency GROUP BY route_id ORDER BY average_on_time_performance DESC;
SELECT date, route_id, total_passengers FROM public_transportation_usage WHERE total_passengers < 50 AND route_id = 2;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM public_transportation_usage GROUP BY route_id ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data WHERE passenger_count > 50;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT trip_id, passenger_count FROM trip_history WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT MAX(passenger_count) AS max_passengers FROM trip_history;
SELECT trip_id, date, route_id, passenger_count FROM public_transportation_data;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data WHERE passenger_count > 50;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation_routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(passenger_count) AS max_passengers, MIN(passenger_count) AS min_passengers FROM public_transportation_data;
SELECT trip_id, date, route_id, passenger_count FROM trip_history WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data ORDER BY date DESC, time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT station_name, city, country FROM station_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT AVG(passengers) AS avg_passengers, AVG(avg_service_time) AS avg_service_time FROM service_performance WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT station_name, date, time, action FROM service_logs WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND action = 'maintenance';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_data WHERE passengers > 50 ORDER BY passengers ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT station_name, passengers, date FROM public_transportation_data ORDER BY date DESC, passengers ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM station_locations WHERE city='New York' AND country='USA'
SELECT station_name, city, country FROM station_locations WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY city
SELECT * FROM service_logs WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND action='maintenance'
SELECT date, avg_passengers, avg_service_time FROM service_performance WHERE efficiency_score > 90 ORDER BY avg_passengers DESC
SELECT * FROM user;
SELECT username, email FROM user WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, route_type FROM route WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM station;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM trip WHERE fare > 100.00 ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, route_type, start_station, end_station FROM route WHERE route_type = 'Bus';
SELECT station_name, location_lat, location_long FROM station ORDER BY station_name ASC;
SELECT trip_id, route_id, average_speed, reliability_score FROM performance WHERE reliability_score > 8 ORDER BY average_speed DESC LIMIT 5;
